thread.title: 2015 BET Hip Hop Awards: All the must-see moments from the ceremony

title: 2015 BET Hip Hop Awards: All the must-see moments from the ceremony
text:
2015 BET Hip Hop Awards: All the must-see moments from the ceremony 2015 BET Hip Hop Awards: All the must-see moments from the ceremony 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
The performances took centre stage at the BET Hip Hop Awards in Atlanta, Georgia, where Kendrick Lamar and Big Sean were the big winners of the night. 
Here are the must-see moments from the ceremony. Diddy performs new music 
— #HipHopAwards (@HipHopAwards) October 14, 2015 
Sean “Diddy” Combs took to the stage with countless artists from Bad Boy Entertainment at the BET Awards earlier this year, and he was back on the BET stage at the hip hop awards to look forward instead of back. He performed his new single Workin and the audience could not help but get up and dance. Snoop battles his addiction 
Ceremony host Snoop Dogg performed in a series of sketches throughout the ceremony and by far the best was one about his battle with his addiction to his hoverboard. The skit showed Snoop struggling through rehab and learning to walk again after giving up his beloved board. Future kicks things off
